text_block_list.text: At Tracen Academy, an event called the "Classification Event" is held, where the horse girls race in different fields.
As the event draws nearer, many of the horse girls are working feverishly on their training for the competition.
Haa…Haaa! Just a bit more…
Here was another horse girl who was exhausted, but still determined to reach the goal.
Goaaaaal… Haa…Haa…
I ran to the horse girl who had fallen down right after crossing the finish line.
I'm fine…
Phew… If I'm going to take first place in the competition, I have to work this hard.
Thanks for worrying about me. Eh, you are…?
I introduced myself to her as a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Oh! You are a trainer! I'm Haru Urara!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hey, hey, if you're a trainer, you're coming to watch the competition, right?
choice_data_list: I'm planning to do it, of course, but...
I'm planning to do it, of course, but...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Then come and watch me run, too! I'm going to come in first, I promise!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: I'm in excellent form, healthy, the carrots are delicious, so I feel like I can win!
Training to the point of collapse, plus this confident look on her face…
In a way, she might be a very special girl…?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: All right, I'm going to continue training! I'll see you later. Bye-bye!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Eho…eho…waaa, my legs feels so heavy!
With a cry that resembled a scream, Urara ran off.
Then on the day of the competition… I went to see what kind of race Urara would run.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: As the race enters the final straight, each horse girl makes her last spurt! Urara is falling behind, and the gap is widening!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: I'm not giving up yet!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: The lead group is in a chaotic fight! That's a close one! It's going to be a photo finish!
All the horse girls except for Urara reached the finish line, but she still kept running desperately.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: I'm almost at the finish line! Almost there! Ohhhhhhh!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Haru Urara with a delay… has just crossed the finish line! The spectators are applauding!
Her outcome was last place, and from the way she was running, I don't think she was injured or in bad shape. In other words, her current run is what she really is…
It wasn't what I had hoped for… but I was strangely attracted to the way she kept running until the very end.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Haaa…Haa…So tired…

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Oh, the trainer from last time! You came to see me!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I said I would win, but I lost. I failed to get the first place again~…

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: But hey, I was able to run as hard as I could until the end! All that training was well worth it!
choice_data_list: —I could see how eager you were.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Really!? That's great!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: That was fun… I want to run again… Running is always fun!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: By the way, I'm also going to participate in the upcoming selection race!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hey, you should come watch too! I'm sure I can win the next time!
choice_data_list: Sure. I'm going to go see it

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: It's a promise!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: All right, I've got to keep training again! Hey, Hey, Hoohh!
Although she must be frustrated with her loss, Urara is very motivated to compete in the next race.
She had such a positive attitude, and for some reason, I felt like I wanted to see her run once more.
